name: The Arland Atelier Trilogy Plus
description:
Arland Atelier Trilogy Plus is a complete set of Atelier Arland series.
This Trilogy includes,
-Atelier Rorona Plus: The Alchemist of Arland
-Atelier Totori Plus: The Adventurer of Arland
-Atelier Meruru Plus: The Apprentice of Arland
Explore the world of Arland with enchanting characters and see the whole story of these Archemists.
Note: Please check to make sure you have enough hard drive space (at least 10GB) before downloading this game.
